items.title: A Surprising Update About ‘Alien: Earth’ Season 2 After The Finale
items.description: Will Alien: Earth get a season 2 on Hulu after its season 1 finale? There are some new updates on that front.

items.title: New Duchenne Therapy Shows Signs Of Reversing Muscle Loss
items.description: Duchenne therapy may be evolving from slowing disease to reversing it—with RNA approaches offering the prospect of restoring function.

items.title: Bowers & Wilkins Unveils Its Latest Flagship Px8 S2 Wireless ANC Headphones
items.description: The new Px8 S2 headphones from British audio brand B&W feature advanced ANC, support for aptX Lossless and come with analog and digital wired options ...

items.title: Switch 2 ‘Borderlands 4’ Delayed Indefinitely, Pre-Orders Cancelled
items.description: Borderlands 4 is not coming out on Nintendo Switch 2 any time soon, given the tech issues it already has on Xbox and PlayStation.

items.title: Trump Immigration Rule Shifts H-1B Lottery To Favor Older Visa Holders
items.description: The Trump administration has proposed a new immigration rule to change the H-1B selection process to favor people in senior positions.
